WorkPlace.Name: JT WORKS ApS
WorkPlace.Description: JTWORKS.dk er 100% Dansk ejet og en seriøs samarbejdspartner. Vi har en bred erhvervserfarring på arbejdsmarkedet. Vi rekrutterer og udlejer såvel faglært som ufaglært arbejdskraft. Vi leverer professionelle bemandingsløsninger, inden for en lang række fagområder. Uanset om der er tale om ekstra kapicitet i en periode eller en mere permanent løsning, tilbyder vi vikar assistance til virksomheder og private.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: WE ARE LOOKING FOR SKILLED CARPENTERS (Odense)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have experience as a carpenter, and are you looking for new challenges, then it might be you we are looking for!

We are looking for a team of 2 carpenters for a project in Odens, where you will have to install gips. You will be a part of a well-established company with skilled and dedicated colleagues.

We offer:

  • Payment according to qualifications
  • Pension, Holiday-money and SH
  • Tool and working clothes
  • 46 working hours per week

We expect that you have experience as a carpenter and know how to install gips. Furthermore, we expect:

  • You are committed and quality-oriented
  • You speak and understand English
  • You are flexible

If you are interested in hearing more about our offer, don’t hesitate to contact our consultants:

fek@jtworks.dk / 5377482 iw@jtworks.dk / 24210379
